alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 10:37AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fulton and Knox Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1036 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Reynolds to Carthage. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cuba. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 34 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
